resource_dependency.authAPI: RESTful API for user registration, login, session management, and role-based access control.
resource_dependency.userSchema: PostgreSQL table with fields: user_id (UUID), name (string), email (string, unique), password_hash (string), role (enum: donor, recipient, volunteer, admin), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).

function: Provide user authentication and account management system with role-based access control.
static_description: A responsive navigation bar with links to Home, Dashboard, Donations, Distributions, Volunteers, and Login/Logout. The background color is Azure (#F0FFFF) and component colors are Midnight Blue (#191970).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' opens a modal form for email/password entry. Submitting the form sends credentials to authAPI for validation and sets session token.
Clicking 'Register' opens a registration form. Upon submission, data is sent to authAPI which creates a new user in the database with assigned role.
Clicking 'Dashboard' when authenticated redirects to personalized dashboard page based on user role.

resource_dependency.donationAPI: RESTful API for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting food donations.
resource_dependency.donationSchema: PostgreSQL table with fields: donation_id (UUID), donor_id (foreign key to users.user_id), title (string), description (text), quantity (integer), pickup_location (string), expiry_date (date), status (enum: available, claimed, distributed), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).
resource_dependency.searchFilterComponent: Frontend reusable component for searching and filtering food donations by keyword, location, expiry date range, and status.

function: Allow users to browse and search food donation listings with filtering capabilities.
static_description: A grid layout displaying cards of food donations. Each card includes title, description, quantity, pickup location, expiry date, and status. Above the grid is a search bar and filter options panel styled with Azure background and Midnight Blue components.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a donation card navigates to the detailed view of that donation.
Typing in the search bar filters displayed donations in real-time by matching keywords in title or description.
Using dropdowns/filters updates the displayed list via query parameters sent to donationAPI.

resource_dependency.distributionAPI: RESTful API for submitting applications for food distribution, viewing pending/approved requests, and managing distribution records.
resource_dependency.distributionSchema: PostgreSQL table with fields: distribution_id (UUID), recipient_id (foreign key to users.user_id), donation_id (foreign key to donations.donation_id), application_date (timestamp), status (enum: applied, approved, rejected, completed), notes (text), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).

function: Enable recipients to apply for food distribution and allow administrators/volunteers to manage these applications.
static_description: A multi-step form for applying to receive food. Fields include personal info (auto-filled from user profile), requested items, reason for request, and preferred pickup time. Styled with Azure background and Midnight Blue components.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form sends data to distributionAPI which stores the application and sets status to 'applied'.
Admins/volunteers can click 'Approve', 'Reject', or 'Mark as Completed' buttons next to each application, triggering corresponding status updates through distributionAPI.

resource_dependency.volunteerAPI: RESTful API for retrieving volunteer profiles, signing up for opportunities, and managing volunteer assignments.
resource_dependency.volunteerSchema: PostgreSQL table with fields: volunteer_id (UUID), user_id (foreign key to users.user_id), skills (array of strings), availability (text), assigned_donations (array of UUID references to donations), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).
resource_dependency.volunteerOpportunitySchema: Separate table for volunteer opportunities linked to donations needing assistance: opportunity_id (UUID), donation_id (foreign key), required_skills (array), start_time (timestamp), end_time (timestamp), max_volunteers (integer), current_volunteers (integer).

function: Display volunteer information and enable volunteers to sign up for opportunities.
static_description: Two sections: one showing active volunteer opportunities in card format (title, required skills, timing, current/max volunteers); another showing logged-in volunteerâ€™s assigned tasks. Both use Azure background and Midnight Blue components.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Sign Up' on an opportunity sends request to volunteerAPI to assign the current user to that opportunity and increment current_volunteers count.
Volunteers can click 'View Details' on their assigned tasks to see full information about the donation they're helping with.

resource_dependency.dashboardAPI: Aggregated RESTful API providing personalized dashboard data based on user roles (donor stats, recipient history, volunteer assignments, admin overview).
resource_dependency.profileUpdateAPI: Endpoint for updating user profile information such as name, contact details, and preferences.

function: Provide a centralized dashboard for users to manage personal account information and view relevant activity summaries.
static_description: Dashboard page showing user profile section (editable fields), recent activities (donations made/received, applications submitted, upcoming volunteer shifts), and quick links to related actions. Background is Azure with Midnight Blue UI components.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can edit profile fields directly in place or via a dedicated 'Edit Profile' modal. Changes are saved by calling profileUpdateAPI.
Clicking on 'Recent Activities' entries navigates to respective detail pages (donation/distribution/volunteer opportunity).

resource_dependency.dbConnectionConfig: PostgreSQL connection using environment variables DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
resource_dependency.schemaDefinition: SQL scripts defining tables for users, donations, distributions, volunteers, and volunteer_opportunities with appropriate foreign key relationships and constraints.

function: Establish and maintain a structured database schema to support all core application entities and relationships.
static_description: Database schema definition files stored under /backend/db/migrations containing CREATE TABLE statements for users, donations, distributions, volunteers, and volunteer_opportunities.

resource_dependency.apiEndpointsList: Defined set of RESTful endpoints covering CRUD operations for users, donations, distributions, and volunteers, plus authentication routes.
resource_dependency.expressRoutesFiles: Backend route handlers implementing defined API logic using Express.js framework.

function: Expose all core functionalities through standardized RESTful API endpoints consumable by frontend services.
static_description: API documentation file outlining base URL, endpoint paths, HTTP methods, expected request/response bodies, success/error codes, and example usage scenarios.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignCSS: CSS stylesheet using media queries and Flexbox/Grid layouts to ensure compatibility across devices.
resource_dependency.colorPaletteVariables: :root CSS variables defining --azure-background: #F0FFFF and --midnight-blue-components: #191970 used throughout the site.

function: Ensure consistent styling with Azure background and Midnight Blue components while maintaining responsiveness across screen sizes.
static_description: Entire frontend interface utilizing a cohesive design system where main backgrounds are Azure (#F0FFFF) and interactive/form components are styled with Midnight Blue (#191970) accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout adjusts dynamically between mobile, tablet, and desktop views using CSS media queries without requiring JavaScript intervention.

resource_dependency.packageJsonFile: Root-level package.json file containing scripts for installing dependencies and running development servers concurrently.

function: Configure repository-wide npm scripts for streamlined installation and local development startup.
static_description: package.json file located at project root with 'scripts' field including 'install:all': 'npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend' and 'dev': 'concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"'.

resource_dependency.formValidationLibrary: Client-side library (e.g., Yup/Zod) integrated with form components to validate user inputs before submission.
resource_dependency.inputSanitizationMiddleware: Express middleware ensuring all incoming POST/PUT body data is sanitized before processing.

function: Enforce strict validation rules on all user-submitted data to prevent invalid or malicious entries.
static_description: All input forms across the application feature inline validation messages powered by schema definitions that match backend expectations.

interaction_and_states.description: Leaving an input field triggers client-side validation; error messages appear immediately if criteria aren't met.
Before sending data to backend APIs, frontend validates entire form. Invalid submissions block network calls until corrected.

resource_dependency.rbacMiddleware: Express middleware checking JWT tokens for user roles and restricting access to protected routes accordingly.
resource_dependency.roleBasedUIFlags: Frontend flags determining visibility of certain UI elements (like admin panels or donor-only features) based on decoded user role.

function: Implement fine-grained access controls allowing only authorized users to perform specific actions or view sensitive areas.
static_description: Different navigation menus and dashboard widgets shown conditionally depending on whether the logged-in user has role 'admin', 'donor', 'recipient', or 'volunteer'.

interaction_and_states.description: Attempting to access restricted pages results in automatic redirection to unauthorized page unless proper role permissions exist.

resource_dependency.searchFilterLogic: Reusable frontend logic encapsulated in components/hooks that build dynamic query strings passed to backend APIs.
resource_dependency.indexingStrategy: Optional backend indexing strategy on searchable columns (title, description, location) to optimize performance.

function: Empower users to efficiently locate relevant content using flexible search and advanced filtering mechanisms.
static_description: Prominent placement of search bars and filter panels above listings of donations and volunteer opportunities, enabling users to narrow results quickly.

interaction_and_states.description: Changing filter selections instantly rebuilds API query string and re-fetches filtered dataset without full page reload.
